name: Messenger React
description: Two-way text messaging app with shared login and live updates.

APP_NAME.description: This needs to match exactly with the 'App name' entered above (don't leave 'App name' blank), or things won't work properly.

TELNYX_API_KEY.description: Create an account at https://telnyx.com, click 'Auth' in the left navigation menu, click 'Create API Key', confirm, click the 'Copy' button and then paste the value here.

TELNYX_NUMBER.description: *IMPORTANT* - format this number like '+18882225555'. In the README of https://github.com/damonvjanis/messenger-react, you should have set up a Telynx number. Enter it here in the format above.

LOGIN_CODE.description: Password to log in. Anyone you give it to can send text messages from your number, so make sure it's a good, secure password.

NOTIFICATION_EMAIL.description: This email address will get a notification whenever a new message comes in and hasn't been read. This can be a team email address if multiple people need to know about new messages.
